Author:

  • Name: Brian Westley
    Location: US

To build:

make all

To use:

./westley

Judges’ remarks:

putchar() must exist in the C library and not just as a macro. If it fails to compile, bug your OS/compiler vendor.

Line by line symmetry performed better than any C beautifier. Think of if it as a C ink blot. :-)

Author’s remarks:

No remarks were provided by the author.
